definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Steven Gerrard today backed calls for the introduction of goal-line technology.
sentences.chinese: 傑拉德今天表示了他對引入球門線技術的支持。

sentences.english: Gerard tried the light on the nightstand, but it was out.
sentences.chinese: 傑拉德試圖打開牀頭燈，但燈沒亮。

sentences.english: It was past one by the time I got to Gerard’s.
sentences.chinese: 這是我去傑拉德家的一段往事。

sentences.english: Real Mallorca are close to announcing a deal for Chelsea attacker Sergio Tejera.
sentences.chinese: 馬略卡即將宣佈與切爾西進攻球員特傑拉德簽約。

sentences.english: And Gerro insists the super-stylish Reds wil NEVER have a better chance to finish champions.
sentences.chinese: 傑拉德說現在是紅軍奪取冠軍的最好時機。

sentences.english: The Reds got back to winning ways with second-half strikes from Gerrard and Yossi Benayoun.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦下半場由傑拉德和貝納永的進球取得勝利。

sentences.english: Obviously the news that Stevie and Fernando were staying gave everyone another lift.
sentences.chinese: 傑拉德和託雷斯的留隊很明顯的鼓舞了我們。

sentences.english: Gerald was nettled by this implication of vulgar materialism.
sentences.chinese: 傑拉德被她話語中流露出的庸俗唯物主義惹惱了。

sentences.english: The centre-half was also made captain for the night at the request of Stevie G.
sentences.chinese: 那晚這位中衛在傑拉德的要求下戴上的隊長袖標。

sentences.english: As soon as Stevie (Gerrard) opened the scoring, we never really looked like losing.
sentences.chinese: 傑拉德的進球幫我們打開了勝利之門。

sentences.english: He shifted his weight and moved past Gerard, gesturing for him to follow.
sentences.chinese: 他轉過身子來到傑拉德面前，示意他跟着他走。

sentences.english: Fitzgerald attributes the depravity of the modern dream to wealth and privilege.
sentences.chinese: 菲茨傑拉德把現在美國夢的墮落歸過與財富與特權。

sentences.english: 'Yes, but suppose you have to?' Gerald persisted.
sentences.chinese: “可要讓你真去解決問題呢？”傑拉德堅持說。

sentences.english: We do not want Steven to play for England with any painkilling injections.
sentences.chinese: 我不希望傑拉德爲了英格蘭的比賽而打封閉。

sentences.english: His preference for Fitzgerald and Moy was another yard off the same cloth.
sentences.chinese: 他對費茨傑拉德和莫伊的偏愛是差不多同樣性質的。

sentences.english: Lacking modern lab techniques, Fitzgerald must use deductive reasoning.
sentences.chinese: 沒有現代的實驗技術，菲茨傑拉德必須運用演繹推理。
